content: a new cast on is always pretty exciting but this one is extra so i think it may just be the perfect at home project not requiring too much thought or concentration playing with pretty colors made entirely from scraps which most knitters / crocheters will have sitting around already and it seems to me that the uglier and smaller the scrap the better it looks in the blanket some pieces i m using are only about 1 yard long i ve wanted to make one of these for years but when i finally went to tackle it i couldn t find a pattern that was just exactly what i wanted please tag me on anything you make from the pattern so i can see your lovely work so much fun to see what you all are up to
